content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the execute_shell command to list the files in my directory and found a file called "atlas.yaml". I then used the read_file command to learn that Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul with the goal of exploring the world. I attempted to use the execute_python_code command, but received an error. I then used the browse_website command to find interesting places for Atlas to explore, including Boston, Porto, Switzerland, and sustainable travel tips.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best places to visit in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland for adventurers"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "https://www.foratravel.com/site-overview", "https://www.forbes.com/advisor/credit-cards/travel-rewards/best-places-to-travel-2023/", "https://www.fourseasons.com/", "https://www.oattravel.com/trips/land-adventures/europe/northern-spain-and-portugal-pilgrimage-into-the-past/2021", "https://travel.usnews.com/features/u-s-news-best-vacations-iconic-cities-bucket-list-adventures-star-in-rankings", "https://www.grayline.com/", "https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/best-places-to-travel-in-2022"]', type='action_result')]
"""
